It seems you need change the=C2=A0attribute of the file named=C2=A0"jmxremo=
te.password" to only can be changed by the owner(in Windows you can use com=
mand: cacls).
If you cannot find this file in the root directory of Heritri=
x, you need do:
1. copy the file "\conf\jmxremote.password.template" to roo=
t.
2. change its name to "jmxremote.password"
3. change the file's content(=
strip the # of the last two lines, change the password to your own):
=C2=A0=
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 monitorRole=C2=A0thePassWordforJ=
MX
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 controlRole thePassWord=
forJMX
4. change the file to only can be changed by the owner.
=C2=A0=C2=A0=
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 
=C2=A0

-Michelle
